column4: aaaanyone able to help me out? I can't active the broadcom b43 legacy driver (it just sits and hangs and gives up) on my laptop even after installing the proprietary firmware :( :( (:
has the nic ever worked properly before?
ok good ... lemme think
just for the heck of it try another livecd.. another distro... verify that it doesn't hang with that
bc nics should work fine
well ok... have you tried reinstall?
lemme think abit
what happens exactly
i've been waiting literally this whole time to reproduce what happens but my hardware drivers window is taking literally five minutes to do "searching for available drivers..."
ok if you do a: lsmod | grep BCM(whatever) what happens
ok, if you just do an lsmod and look for a bcm...
ok good
ok verify what is the chipset on this wireless nic for sure
how specifically do i do that? i'm sorry.
ok this nic for sure is BCM(whatever)
because BCM is very solid in linux IMHO
i can paste (or whatever pasting thing you guys do here) my lspci if you want
sure
my gut feeling is that not all the vegetables are loading up...
go to lib folder and tell me when you are there
PM me
